document_data.caption: A common rope ladder.
document_data.name: Rope Ladder
document_data.mainbody: '''Rope ladders''' were a type of [[ladder]] made largely of [[rope]], with wooden slats between.
document_data.Description: The average rope ladder was made from [[hemp]] rope, with wooden slats measuring {{SI|2|in|c|long=yes}} wide.
document_data.Notable Users: * [[Ranger]]s sometimes carried rope ladders throughout the wilds of [[Faer√ªn]]. Though most were quite fleet-footed and dexterous enough to climb trees without the need of such aid, they were sometimes needed to provide aid to clumsy companions.
document_data.History: Rope ladders were available for sale through ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue (in-universe)|Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]'', where they were sold in increments of {{SI|2|ft|long=yes}} for 1 [[silver piece]] per {{SI|4|ft|long=yes}}.
